text:
It's rare to see such disrespect and disregard for customers. I arrived at the 'showroom' during opening hours to look at lights. No one was around. I called, no answer. After 20 minutes, someone came to open up, but said I couldn't even look at the lights, as it was lunch everyday at this time. When does lunch finish? Maybe another hour, go get a coffee.
To customers, i warn, don't bother. There is no way to buy online or in person.
To the 'business':
Put your opening and closing times accurately on the website, on the showroom door, on your phone message.
Purchased a solar light on the 03 Feb. edit-13/2/2024 managed to call them and speak to a staff remember who will arrange delivery, will update later. delivery received.
